response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it holds a high significance for you, valued at $12,000 to you personally. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a substantial benefit while also maximizing the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 9500}
